comments.raw_text: Per review comments in bug 698495, we could use a Debug_SetValueToCrashOnTouch so callers don't have to use Debug_SetValuesToCrashOnTouch(&v, 1).
comments.text: Per review comments in bug 698495, we could use a Debug_SetValueToCrashOnTouch so callers don't have to use Debug_SetValuesToCrashOnTouch(&v, 1).
comments.author: bzbarsky@mit.edu
